title: Sepp Kuss delivers stunning red jersey defense: ‘I would love to win the race’
content:
Colorado climber sounding more confident in his chances to become first US winner of the Vuelta a España in 10 years: 'I have to believe in myself.'

Read the full article at Sepp Kuss delivers stunning red jersey defense: ‘I would love to win the race’ on Velo.
author: ahood
